name: Bin Recycler
description:
In this fast-paced first-person shooter, you are personally responsible for freeing up disc space - by deleting files from the recycle bin...

by shooting them into oblivion with a large variety of guns!

  • Unlock new weapons with the character progression!
  • Pick up temporary power-ups~!
  • Randomly generated levels and enemies

The game is an entry to the 2021 Epic MegaJam titled "running out of space".

Controls:

  • ESC - Toggle menu (you can change settings including mouse sensitivity)
  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire weapon
  • Right Mouse Button / Space - Jump
  • 1, 2, 3 - Switch weapons (Primary, Secondary, Heavy)
  • F - Pick up interactable items

Some items get picked up by contact (i.e. powerups and ammo).
